Özellikle oyunun akıcılığı ve arkaplanındaki olayları sizi içine sürüklüyor ve oynarken sıkılmanıza izin vermiyor.Oyundaki yaratık ve silah çeşitliliği apayrı bir güzellik ve oyunun size farklı bölümlerde verdiği araçlar ile farklı bir oynanışa sahip oluyorsunuz.Haritada bulunan yapılar,bulmacalar,bolca loot cabası.Ben hilesiz yapamam diyorsanız oyunda konsoldan silah alabilir god mode açabilirsiniz.Oyunda bir dolu easter egg de mevcut.İndirimde 2 TL oluyor almanız tavsiye edilir

I have played this game since i was 7 years old. I was a huge fan, always looked into playing it. I play it even current days.
Never gets old.

The story and characters make me feel real. Like this whole story is real.
I highly suggest buying this game.

Half-Life 2 is one of those games where the best experience is when you play it for the first time. This game is like no other Valve game, very good story rich game with so many ways of playing it.
It is a surprise to me that this game was made in 2004 and still has many features that games today don't have. Half-Life 2 is a game where you can play it over and over again and you will never get bored.
The thing with Half-Life 2 is the way everything is positioned. Every map is different. With games in 2021/2022, some of the maps in the games are very repetitive, leaving no space for something that can be added. With Half-Life 2, every level is different, each with a different feeling.
The ending especially, which I will not spoil. It makes you feel a sense that is different to other games. Makes you re-think what happened.
Get this game if you haven't already, maybe even Episode 1 and Episode 2.

Of course, this is the game of the generation, the unshakable classics of the gaming industry, and so on. However, the plot did not really interest me. I like this game, of course, but in my opinion, the universe itself is not distinguished by an outstanding plot. The game should definitely be on the shelf of legendary games, but at one time it was shot solely because of the graphics and physics, and not because of the plot. I know that not many will agree with me, please, if you want to challenge this opinion, write in the comments why you disagree, maybe I’m still wrong.

early 2000's kid, this was my first time playing the game & it still holds up in December 2021. The game has some annoying parts but it's mostly really fun and insanely impressive that it came out in 2004, since it feels more like a game from 2015. Never played a game quite the same, it's definitely unique. Cool story and scenario too. 4.5/5 stars from me, not an absolutely perfect game imo but a very solid classic that anyone who enjoys FPS shooters should play

Um dos melhores jogos da serie, o que faltou pra Half-life 1 ser perfeito, Half-Life 2 tem.A adição de barco e buggy para o jogador dirigir aumentou muito a experiencia do jogador, sem contar os gráficos, mesmo sendo um jogo de 2004, tem gráficos muito a frente do seu tempo. A historia de Half-life 2 segue fiel a historia de Half-Life 1 (Tem pouquíssimos furos nas historias, que se torna até irrelevante). Sendo assim, recomendo a todos que joguem esse jogo.
